body:
We need a regression test that exercises loaner-firmware images with CHIRP after the whitelist change.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Add a CI job that builds the firmware and runs the CHIRP UV-K5 driver against a canned image
- [ ] Ensure the test checks that uploads/downloads succeed without unsupported firmware warnings
- [ ] Document how to run the test locally in BUILDING.md

## Notes
- Pull in the CHIRP driver from kk7ds/chirp after PR #1414 merges
- Consider using a mocked serial transport or prerecorded EEPROM image to avoid hardware dependencies
title: Automate CHIRP compatibility test
